description:
xBIM Geometry is the Geometry processing part of the Xbim libraries.
xBIM is an Open Source Toolkit for developing IFC based applications (BuildingSmart Data model). 
It provides full support for reading and writing geometry, topology and data in accordance with the Ifc2x3 schema.
xBIM reads and writes Ifc, IfcXMl and IfcZip formats.
The xBIM project provides packages to convert IFC models to COBie spreadsheets in both UK and US cultures as well as a range of 3D viewing controls for use with Windows forms, WPF, WEBGL and OpenGL platforms.
IOS and Android versions are under development.
releaseNotes:
3.1.12 Minor change to update version of WexBIM files to 2
          3.1.11 geometry engine syncronised with latest OCC build 
          3.1.4 performance significantly improved, support for complex geometries added, specifically large complex booleans
          3.1.0 deploys net40 signed assemblies as opposed to net45 unsigned.
          3.0.24 uses version 4 of the .Net framework for greater compatibility with installed clients. 
          3.0.23 Has improved performance and accuracy for boolean and other geometric operations and is updated to use OCC 6.9.0
          3.0 contains a new geometry engine that has a full API to allow geometry constructions, boolean operations and meshing.
          All Ifc2x3 geometry classes are now supported.
summary: The .Net toolkit for developing BIM applications based on the IFC standard. Essential support for the Ifc data model
title: xBIM Geometry
